item.title: Run MongoDB using Private Registry
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using private Docker registry KubeDB operator supports using private Docker registry. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run MongoDB database using private Docker images. Before You Begin Read concept of MongoDB Version Catalog to learn detail concepts of MongoDBVersion object. you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
